Standard: Master, I'm going out to gather herbs!
Wow, there are so many herbs growing here! It's a harvest today!
Then Mia discovers a strange herb that emits a mysterious scent.
Oh,? What's this? I've never seen it before!
Mia crouched down and began to gather herbs, and as he pulled up the vines, a huge tentacle attached to the root of the herbs tampered with Mia's body.
Who are you? Please help me!
It seems that someone has fallen into the very trap.
